alert.note: Alert for Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 1:23PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Lander County through 200 PM PDT... At 122 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Austin, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph along with brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Lander County including Austin Airport and US Highway 50 from New Pass Summit and the Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County
